official_title: A bill to provide for assistance to the noncommunist resistance forces in Mozambique and to prohibit economic and military assistance to the People's Republic of Mozambique.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to make available to the noncommunist resistance forces in Mozambique up to $5,000,000 for each of FY 1986 and 1987 out of the funds authorized for military assistance and for the Economic Support Fund. Directs the President to suspend all economic and military aid to the Mozambique Government. Terminates such suspension if the President determines that free and fair elections have been held in Mozambique.

titles.title: A bill to provide for assistance to the noncommunist resistance forces in Mozambique and to prohibit economic and military assistance to the People's Republic of Mozambique.
